text: sabake sab allaah ke saamane khulakar aa jaenge to kamazor log, un logon se jo bade bane hue the, kahenge, "ham to tumhaare peechhe chalate the. to kya tum allaah kee yaatana mein se kuchh hamapar taal sakate ho? ve kahenge, "yadi allaah hamen maarg dikhaata to ham tumhen bhee dikhaate. ab yadi ham vyaakul hon ya dhairy se kaam len, hamaare lie baraabar hai. hamaare lie bachane ka koee upaay nahinà¥¤
